title: Elon Musk's Downscaled Twitter Faces Soccer World Cup Test
description: Employees have been working for weeks to prepare for the sporting extravaganza, a Twitter executive says.

title: Track Your Ovulation: Apple Watch vs. Oura Ring
description: The latest wearable-tech trend involves skin-temperature sensors and can help you get pregnant—or prevent it.

title: Crypto Bank Silvergate Battles FTX Contagion Fears
description: The bank’s shares have plummeted even as Silvergate takes steps to reassure investors of its stability amid FTX’s collapse.

title: Musk Says Twitter to Reinstate Trump's Account After Online Poll
description: The move would broaden the former president’s potential reach days after he declared another run for the White House.
